title: MD
biography: Jaime Castro Castro is a Colombian lawyer and politician, who served as Mayor of Bogotá from 1992 to 1994. A Liberal Party politician, he served as Minister of Government under President Belisario Betancur Cuartas, and as Minister of Justice under President Misael Pastrana Borrero.
aiSummary: Jaime Restrepo Cuartas is a public health specialist with an H-index of 2 at University of Antioquia (Member). Has been published in BMJ global health, The Lancet. Child & adolescent health, Lancet (London, England). Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
